title: Bug 116609[Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: Description: The color orange is not rendering correctly. Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Preview window and type 'orange' as the color value.
OB: Observed behavior: When the color 'orange' is used, the color is not displayed as expected.
EB: Expected behavior: When the color 'orange' is used, the text or element should be displayed in the color orange.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the Preview window. 2. Type 'orange' as the color value. 3. Observe that the color is not displayed correctly.
